name: Cyberstar
description: Cyberstar is an Story Oriented 3rd Person Shooter game set in the year 2050 that follows Johnny Vulker (Voiced by Bobby Ponce) in his long pursuit after his father who left him for a life of crime. In an attempt to follow in his father's footsteps he meets his partner in crime and lover Valeria Rey (Voiced by Victoria Costilla). But all along the father may be closer than you think...
